_aChangeLog.text: Small improvements all over the Navigation Mesh
Improved bot's movement through all stairways

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_OFFGRID

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: January 16 2016

Here is the Navigation Mesh for high-detailed and athmospheric industrial themed map de_offgrid by catfoOd (created September 2011). It's created from scratch and manually optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file ('cause original .nav-file included in mapauthor's release was not perfect).

In particular, there were completely no pathways at top levels of the map. Also many not accuracies in other pathways were allowed.

Well... bots use all possible ways now. And they are perfectly guided in the management of modern manufacturing enterprise :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by mapauthor included in original archive and available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes: catfoOd (for very realistic and fight-friendly atmospheric industrial map).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

It's not a raiding, it's simply a scheduled inspection! :-)

P.S. In addition to the NAV-file the archive also contains a minimap for the radar (which was not presented in the original release of the map).
